text: Free cash deposits up to `1,50,000 per month at any Ujjivan SFB branch.
50 free "at par" cheque leaves per quarter.
Point of Sales Solutions (POS) - Standalone POS terminals / Wireless POS Terminals GP terminals (Offered through third party tie ups).
Enjoy the benefits of Rupay Classic debit card with Unlimited free ATM transactions at Ujjivan ATM and 6 free transactions at other bank ATM.
Enhanced limits of `50,000 per day in ATM and `1,00,000 in Shopping.
50 Free Cash withdrawal at Ujjivan Branch every month.
Electronic Fund Transfer NEFT, RTGS, IMPS at nominal costs.
Transaction alerts for updates on your account as and when transactions happen. No need to visit a branch or ATM.
Non-cash services (DD and PO transactions at nominal cost).
Need for maintenance of Monthly average balance of `5,000 per month
Non-maintenance of the minimum balance entails a fee of `150+ GST per month.
